fields.summary: DashboardView fires delete events for all items even when not in edit mode

comments.body: I can confirm this bug is still present. Clicking a dashboard item when not in edit mode fires the delete event. It seems also to be fired when existing edit mode (not sure if it fires before or after the commit event).
